He is used for the following characters: {| border="0" |- !width=7%|Map!!width=14%|Name!!width=76%|Notes |- | MAP02 || {{dw|Strife minor characters - Hub 1#Arion|Arion}} || [[Classes:Peasant22|Governor Mourel]]'s secretary. |- | MAP04 || Technician || He is very worried that that the core may explode. |} ==== [[DECORATE]] definition ==== ACTOR Peasant2 : {{Class|Peasant}} { {{Property|Speed}} 5 }
